text: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ
translation: Alipo mwambia baba yake na watu wake: Ni nini haya masanamu mnayo yashughulikia kuyaabudu?
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Kumbuka pale Ibrahim alipo mwambia baba yake na watu wake kuwaonya juu ya masanamu waliyo kuwa wakishughulikia kuyaabudu: Ni nini haya masanamu ambayo nyinyi mmeshika kuyaabudu?
